caller_intent: Cecilia Cruz wanted to confirm the time frame for a scheduled service pickup at her location (348 Summit Square Boulevard) and requested an estimated arrival time (ETA) for the technician.
resolution_steps: Agent Teresa asked Cecilia for a work order number (96263022) to reference the service request.
Teresa placed Cecilia on hold to contact the scheduler for the ETA.
After a delay, Teresa informed Cecilia that the technician was unavailable and the scheduler was still finishing another task.
Teresa assured Cecilia that a callback would be made within an hour to provide the ETA.
knowledge_required: Handling customer inquiries about technician availability
systems_referenced: Internal scheduler system (to coordinate with technicians)
summary: Cecilia called Culligan Quench to confirm the ETA for a scheduled service pickup. The agent retrieved the work order number, contacted the scheduler, and informed Cecilia that a callback would be made within an hour to provide the technician's arrival time. The call ended with the agent apologizing for the delay and confirming the follow-up.
